vk_features.json: Optional features for the Vulkan renderer.

features.name: append_aliased_memory_decorations
description: Append aliased memory decoration to ssbo and image in SPIR-V if they are not declared with restrict memory qualifier in GLSL

features.name: bresenham_line_rasterization
description: Enable Bresenham line rasterization via VK_EXT_line_rasterization extension

features.name: provoking_vertex
description: Enable provoking vertex mode via VK_EXT_provoking_vertex extension

features.name: force_fallback_format
description: Force a fallback format for angle_end2end_tests

features.name: clamp_point_size
description: The point size range reported from the API is inconsistent with the actual behavior

features.name: supports_depth_clamp_zero_one
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_depth_clamp_zero_one extension

features.name: clamp_frag_depth
description: gl_FragDepth is not clamped when rendering to a floating point depth buffer without VK_EXT_depth_clamp_zero_one

features.name: mutable_mipmap_texture_upload
description: Enable uploading the previously defined mutable mipmap texture.

features.name: use_vma_for_image_suballocation
description: Utilize VMA for image memory suballocation.

features.name: supports_memory_budget
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_memory_budget extension.

features.name: supports_renderpass2
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_create_renderpass2 extension

features.name: supports_incremental_present
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_incremental_present extension

features.name: supports_android_hardware_buffer
description: VkDevice supports the VK_ANDROID_external_memory_android_hardware_buffer extension

features.name: supports_GGP_frame_token
description: VkDevice supports the VK_GGP_frame_token extension

features.name: supports_external_memory_fd
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_external_memory_fd extension

features.name: supports_external_memory_fuchsia
description: VkDevice supports the VK_FUCHSIA_external_memory extension

features.name: supports_external_fence_capabilities
description: VkInstance supports the VK_KHR_external_fence_capabilities extension

features.name: supports_external_semaphore_capabilities
description: VkInstance supports the VK_KHR_external_semaphore_capabilities extension

features.name: supports_external_semaphore_fd
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_external_semaphore_fd extension

features.name: supports_external_semaphore_fuchsia
description: VkDevice supports the VK_FUCHSIA_external_semaphore extension

features.name: supports_external_fence_fd
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_external_fence_fd extension

features.name: supports_android_native_fence_sync
description: VkDevice supports the EGL_ANDROID_native_fence_sync extension

features.name: supports_image_cube_array
description: VkDevice supports the imageCubeArray feature properly

features.name: supports_pipeline_statistics_query
description: VkDevice supports the pipelineStatisticsQuery feature

features.name: supports_shader_stencil_export
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_shader_stencil_export extension

features.name: supports_YUV_sampler_conversion
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_sampler_ycbcr_conversion extension

features.name: emulate_transform_feedback
description: Emulate transform feedback as the VK_EXT_transform_feedback is not present.

features.name: supports_transform_feedback_extension
description: Transform feedback uses the VK_EXT_transform_feedback extension.

features.name: supports_geometry_streams_capability
description: Implementation supports the GeometryStreams SPIR-V capability.

features.name: supports_index_type_uint8
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_index_type_uint8 extension

features.name: supports_custom_border_color
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_custom_border_color extension

features.name: supports_multi_draw_indirect
description: VkDevice supports the multiDrawIndirect extension

features.name: supports_depth_stencil_resolve
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_depth_stencil_resolve extension

features.name: supports_depth_stencil_independent_resolve_none
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_depth_stencil_resolve
extension with the independentResolveNone feature

features.name: supports_multisampled_render_to_single_sampled
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_multisampled_render_to_single_sampled extension

features.name: prefer_MSRTSS_flag_by_default
description: Enable MSRTSS for each image initialization if available

features.name: supports_multiview
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_multiview extension

features.name: force_D16_tex_filter
description: VK_FORMAT_D16_UNORM does not support VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT,
which prevents OES_depth_texture from being supported.

features.name: disable_flipping_blit_with_command
description: vkCmdBlitImage with flipped coordinates blits incorrectly.

features.name: per_frame_window_size_query
description: Vulkan swapchain is not returning VK_ERROR_OUT_OF_DATE when window resizing

features.name: pad_buffers_to_max_vertex_attrib_stride
description: Vulkan considers vertex attribute accesses to count up to the last multiple of the
stride. This additional access supports AMD's robust buffer access implementation.
AMDVLK in particular will return incorrect values when the vertex access extends into
the range that would be the stride padding and the buffer is too small.
This workaround limits GL_MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIB_STRIDE to a maximum value and
pads up every buffer allocation size to be a multiple of the maximum stride.

features.name: supports_external_memory_dma_buf_and_modifiers
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_external_memory_dma_buf and VK_EXT_image_drm_format_modifier
extensions

features.name: supports_external_memory_host
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_external_memory_host extension

features.name: allocate_non_zero_memory
description: Fill new allocations with non-zero values to flush out errors.

features.name: log_memory_report_callbacks
description: Log each callback from VK_EXT_device_memory_report

features.name: log_memory_report_stats
description: Log stats from VK_EXT_device_memory_report each swap

features.name: prefer_CPU_for_buffer_sub_data
description: Prefer use CPU to do bufferSubData instead of staged update.

features.name: persistently_mapped_buffers
description: Persistently map buffer memory to reduce map/unmap IOCTL overhead.

features.name: enable_pre_rotate_surfaces
description: Enable Android pre-rotation for landscape applications

features.name: enable_precision_qualifiers
description: Enable precision qualifiers in shaders

features.name: varyings_require_matching_precision_in_spirv
description: Add additional SPIR-V instructions to make sure precision
between shader stages match with each other

features.name: prefer_aggregate_barrier_calls
description: Single barrier call is preferred over multiple calls with
fine grained pipeline stage dependency information

features.name: prefer_skipping_invalidate_for_emulated_formats
description: Skipping invalidate is preferred for emulated formats that have extra channels over
re-clearing the image

features.name: async_command_queue
description: Use CommandQueue worker thread to dispatch work to GPU.

features.name: slow_async_command_queue_for_testing
description: Artificially slow down async command queue for threading testing

features.name: supports_shader_float16
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_shader_float16_int8 extension
and has the shaderFloat16 feature

features.name: allow_GenerateMipmap_with_compute
description: Use the compute path to generate mipmaps on devices that meet the minimum requirements,
and the performance is better.

features.name: supports_render_pass_store_op_none
description: VkDevice supports VK_QCOM_render_pass_store_ops extension.

features.name: supports_render_pass_load_store_op_none
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_load_store_op_none extension.

features.name: disallow_mixed_depth_stencil_load_op_none_and_load
description: Disallow use of LOAD_OP_NONE for only one of the depth or stencil aspects of a
depth/stencil attachment

features.name: supports_depth_clip_control
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_depth_clip_control extension.

features.name: supports_primitive_topology_list_restart
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_primitive_topology_list_restart extension.

features.name: supports_blend_operation_advanced
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_blend_operation_advanced extension.

features.name: supports_blend_operation_advanced_coherent
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_blend_operation_advanced_coherent extension.

features.name: force_max_uniform_buffer_size_16KB
description: Force max uniform buffer size to 16K on some device due to bug

features.name: supports_image_format_list
description: Enable VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT by default for ICDs
that support VK_KHR_image_format_list

features.name: allow_multisampled_render_to_texture_emulation
description: Allow emulation of EXT_multisampled_render_to_texture

features.name: enable_multisampled_render_to_texture
description: Expose EXT_multisampled_render_to_texture

features.name: wait_idle_before_swapchain_recreation
description: Before passing an oldSwapchain to VkSwapchainCreateInfoKHR, wait for queue to be idle.
Works around a bug on platforms which destroy oldSwapchain in vkCreateSwapchainKHR.

features.name: force_texture_lod_offset_1
description: Increase the minimum texture level-of-detail by 1 when sampling.

features.name: force_texture_lod_offset_2
description: Increase the minimum texture level-of-detail by 2 when sampling.

features.name: force_texture_lod_offset_3
description: Increase the minimum texture level-of-detail by 3 when sampling.

features.name: force_texture_lod_offset_4
description: Increase the minimum texture level-of-detail by 4 when sampling.

features.name: force_nearest_filtering
description: Force nearest filtering when sampling.

features.name: force_nearest_mip_filtering
description: Force nearest mip filtering when sampling.

features.name: compress_vertex_data
description: Compress vertex data to smaller data types when
possible. Using this feature makes ANGLE non-conformant.

features.name: prefer_draw_clear_over_vkCmdClearAttachments
description: On some hardware, clear using a draw call instead of vkCmdClearAttachments in the middle
of render pass due to bugs

features.name: emulated_prerotation_90
description: Emulate 90-degree prerotation.

features.name: emulated_prerotation_180
description: Emulate 180-degree prerotation.

features.name: emulated_prerotation_270
description: Emulate 270-degree prerotation.

features.name: prefer_driver_uniform_over_spec_const
description: Prefer using driver uniforms instead of specialization constants.

features.name: expose_non_conformant_extensions_and_versions
description: Expose GLES versions and extensions that are not conformant.

features.name: emulate_R32f_image_atomic_exchange
description: Emulate r32f images with r32ui to support imageAtomicExchange.

features.name: force_fragment_shader_precision_highp_to_mediump
description: Forces highp precision in fragment shader to mediump.

features.name: prefer_submit_at_FBO_boundary
description: Submit commands to driver at each FBO boundary for performance improvements.

features.name: use_multiple_descriptors_for_external_formats
description: Return a default descriptor count for external formats.

features.name: supports_protected_memory
description: VkDevice supports protected memory

features.name: supports_host_query_reset
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_host_query_reset extension

features.name: supports_pipeline_creation_feedback
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_pipeline_creation_feedback extension

features.name: supports_primitives_generated_query
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_primitives_generated_query extension

features.name: supports_surface_capabilities2_extension
description: VkInstance supports the VK_KHR_get_surface_capabilities2 extension

features.name: supports_surface_protected_capabilities_extension
description: VkInstance supports the VK_KHR_surface_protected_capabilities extension

features.name: supports_surfaceless_query_extension
description: VkInstance supports the VK_GOOGLE_surfaceless_query extension

features.name: supports_surface_protected_swapchains
description: VkSurface supportsProtected for protected swapchains

features.name: override_surface_format_RGB8_to_RGBA8
description: Override surface format GL_RGB8 to GL_RGBA8

features.name: supports_shared_presentable_image_extension
description: VkSurface supports the VK_KHR_shared_presentable_images extension

features.name: supports_shader_framebuffer_fetch
description: Whether the Vulkan backend supports coherent framebuffer fetch

features.name: supports_shader_framebuffer_fetch_non_coherent
description: Whether the Vulkan backend supports non-coherent framebuffer fetch

features.name: permanently_switch_to_framebuffer_fetch_mode
description: Whether the context should permanently switch to framebuffer fetch mode on first
encounter

features.name: supports_lock_surface_extension
description: Surface supports the EGL_KHR_lock_surface3 extension

features.name: swapbuffers_on_flush_or_finish_with_single_buffer
description: Bypass deferredFlush with calling swapbuffers on flush or finish when in Shared
Present mode

features.name: emulate_dithering
description: Emulate OpenGL dithering

features.name: round_output_after_dithering
description: Round output after dithering to workaround a driver bug that rounds the output up

features.name: adjust_clear_color_precision
description: Adjust normalized clear color precision based on framebuffer color channel bits count

features.name: emulate_advanced_blend_equations
description: Emulate GL_KHR_blend_equation_advanced

features.name: double_depth_bias_constant_factor
description: Due to a Vulkan spec ambiguity, some drivers interpret depthBiasConstantFactor as half
the expected value

features.name: bottom_left_origin_present_region_rectangles
description: On some platforms present region rectangles are expected to have a bottom-left origin,
instead of top-left origin as from spec

features.name: force_submit_immutable_texture_updates
description: Force submit updates to immutable textures

features.name: supports_SPIRV_1_4
description: VkDevice supports VK_KHR_spirv_1_4 extension

features.name: retain_SPIRV_debug_info
description: Retain debug info in SPIR-V blob.

features.name: warm_up_pipeline_cache_at_link
description: Warm up the Vulkan pipeline cache at link time

features.name: prefer_device_local_memory_host_visible
description: Prefer adding HOST_VISIBLE flag for DEVICE_LOCAL memory when picking memory types

features.name: supports_extended_dynamic_state
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state extension

features.name: use_vertex_input_binding_stride_dynamic_state
description: Use the Vertex Input Bininding Stride dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state

features.name: use_cull_mode_dynamic_state
description: Use the Cull Mode dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state

features.name: use_front_face_dynamic_state
description: Use the Front Face dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state

features.name: use_depth_test_enable_dynamic_state
description: Use the Depth Test Enable dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state

features.name: use_depth_write_enable_dynamic_state
description: Use the Depth Write Enable dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state

features.name: use_depth_compare_op_dynamic_state
description: Use the Depth Compare Op dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state

features.name: use_stencil_test_enable_dynamic_state
description: Use the Stencil Test Enable dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state

features.name: use_stencil_op_dynamic_state
description: Use the Stencil Op dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state

features.name: supports_extended_dynamic_state2
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state2 extension

features.name: use_primitive_restart_enable_dynamic_state
description: Use the Primitive Restart Enable dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state2

features.name: use_rasterizer_discard_enable_dynamic_state
description: Use the Rasterizer Discard Enable dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state2

features.name: use_depth_bias_enable_dynamic_state
description: Use the Depth Bias Enable dynamic state from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state2

features.name: supports_logic_op_dynamic_state
description: VkDevice supports the logicOp feature of VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state2 extension

features.name: supports_fragment_shading_rate
description: VkDevice supports VK_KHR_fragment_shading_rate extension

features.name: supports_foveated_rendering
description: Use VK_KHR_fragment_shading_rate extension to implement QCOM foveated rendering extensions

features.name: generate_fragment_shading_rate_attchement_with_cpu
description: Generate the fragment shading rates on the CPU instead of a compute shader

features.name: supports_fragment_shader_pixel_interlock
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_fragment_shader_interlock extension
and has the fragmentShaderPixelInterlock feature

features.name: explicitly_enable_per_sample_shading
description: Explicitly enable per-sample shading if the fragment shader contains the
sample qualifier

features.name: explicitly_cast_mediump_float_to_16_bit
description: Explicitly cast mediump floating point values to 16 bit

features.name: force_continuous_refresh_on_shared_present
description: Force to create vulkan swapchain with continuous refresh on shared present

features.name: supports_image_2d_view_of_3d
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_image_2d_view_of_3d

features.name: supports_sampler_2d_view_of_3d
description: VkDevice supports the sampler2DViewOf3D feature of VK_EXT_image_2d_view_of_3d

features.name: supports_imageless_framebuffer
description: VkDevice supports VK_KHR_imageless_framebuffer extension

features.name: prefer_linear_filter_for_YUV
description: Prefer to use VK_FILTER_LINEAR for VkSamplerYcbcrConversion

features.name: supports_yuv_target
description: VkDevice supports VK_ANDROID_render_to_external_format and VK_EXT_ycbcr_attachment

features.name: use_non_zero_stencil_write_mask_static_state
description: Work around a driver bug where 0 in stencil write mask static state would make the
corresponding dynamic state malfunction in the presence of discard or alpha to coverage

features.name: map_unspecified_color_space_to_pass_through
description: Use VK_COLOR_SPACE_PASS_THROUGH_EXT for EGL_NONE or unspecifed color
spaces

features.name: supports_timestamp_surface_attribute
description: Platform supports setting frame timestamp surface attribute

features.name: supports_rasterization_order_attachment_access
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_rasterization_order_attachment_access extension

features.name: egl_colorspace_attribute_passthrough
description: Support passthrough of EGL colorspace attribute values

features.name: supports_pipeline_robustness
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_pipeline_robustness extension

features.name: supports_vertex_input_dynamic_state
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_vertex_input_dynamic_state extension

features.name: supports_color_write_enable
description: VkDevice supports VK_EXT_color_write_enable extension

features.name: supports_presentation
description: VkDisplay supports presentation through a present family queue

features.name: supports_compute_transcode_etc_to_bc
description: supports compute shader transcode etc format to bc format

features.name: supports_graphics_pipeline_library
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_graphics_pipeline_library extension

features.name: prefer_monolithic_pipelines_over_libraries
description: Whether monolithic pipelines perform significantly better than libraries

features.name: slow_down_monolithic_pipeline_creation_for_testing
description: Artificially slow down async monolithic pipeline creation for threading testing

features.name: disable_pipeline_cache_load_for_testing
description: Disable loading the pipeline cache from the blob cache for testing

features.name: sync_monolithic_pipelines_to_blob_cache
description: Whether it's beneficial to store monolithic pipelines in the blob cache when
VK_EXT_graphics_pipeline_library is in use.  Otherwise the libraries are stored
only, and monolithic pipelines are recreated on every run

features.name: merge_program_pipeline_caches_to_global_cache
description: Whether it's beneficial to merge the pipeline cache for the shaders subset of the
pipeline into the monolithic pipeline cache.  Only useful on platforms where
monolithic pipelines can reuse blobs from partial pipelines

features.name: has_effective_pipeline_cache_serialization
description: Whether the implementation serializes the Vulkan pipeline cache effectively.
On some implementations, pipeline cache serialization returns no data, so there
is no benefit to serializing it

features.name: enable_async_pipeline_cache_compression
description: Enable compressing pipeline cache in a thread.

features.name: supports_pipeline_protected_access
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_pipeline_protected_access extension

features.name: supports_mixed_read_write_depth_stencil_layouts
description: VkDevice supports the mixed read and write depth/stencil layouts introduced by VK_KHR_maintenance2

features.name: supports_maintenance5
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_maintenance5 extension

features.name: supports_surface_maintenance1
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_surface_maintenance1 extension

features.name: supports_swapchain_maintenance1
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_surface_maintenance1 and VK_EXT_swapchain_maintenance1 extensions

features.name: supports_get_memory_requirements2
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_get_memory_requirements2 extension

features.name: supports_bind_memory2
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_bind_memory2 extension

features.name: supports_sampler_mirror_clamp_to_edge
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_sampler_mirror_clamp_to_edge extension

features.name: prefer_submit_on_any_samples_passed_query_end
description: Submit commands to driver when last GL_ANY_SAMPLES_PASSED query is made for performance improvements.

features.name: force_wait_for_submission_to_complete_for_query_result
description: Force wait for submission to complete before calling getQueryResult(wait).

features.name: async_command_buffer_reset
description: Reset command buffer in async thread.

features.name: use_reset_command_buffer_bit_for_secondary_pools
description: Use VK_COMMAND_POOL_CREATE_RESET_COMMAND_BUFFER_BIT for initializing
SecondaryCommandPools when using VulkanSecondaryCommandBuffer.

features.name: enable_pipeline_cache_data_compression
description: enable pipeline cache data compression.

features.name: supports_legacy_dithering
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_legacy_dithering extension

features.name: limit_sample_count_to_2
description: Limit sample count to 2 to save memory on low end devices.

features.name: supports_full_screen_exclusive
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_full_screen_exclusive extension

features.name: force_disable_full_screen_exclusive
description: Device needs VK_EXT_full_screen_exclusive explicitly disabled

features.name: supports_portability_enumeration
description: Vulkan supports VK_KHR_portability_enumeration extension

features.name: enable_portability_enumeration
description: Enable use of VK_KHR_portability_enumeration extension

features.name: supports_timeline_semaphore
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_timeline_semaphore extension

features.name: supports_format_feature_flags2
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_format_feature_flags2 extension

features.name: supports_host_image_copy
description: VkDevice supports the VK_EXT_host_image_copy extension

features.name: allow_host_image_copy_despite_non_identical_layout
description: When using VK_EXT_host_image_copy, allow VK_IMAGE_USAGE_HOST_TRANSFER_BIT_EXT even if
perf query indicates only optimalDeviceAccess, but not identicalMemoryLayout

features.name: enable_parallel_compile_and_link
description: Expose the GL_KHR_parallel_shader_compile extension

features.name: prefer_host_cached_for_non_static_buffer_usage
description: prefer host cached memory for non static buffer usage

features.name: supports_external_format_resolve
description: VkDevice supports the VK_ANDROID_external_format_resolve extension

features.name: disable_separate_shader_objects
description: Disable GL_EXT_separate_shader_objects and cap core ES version to 3.0

features.name: force_sample_usage_for_ahb_backed_images
description: Force enable VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT usage for all AHB images

features.name: avoid_OpSelect_with_mismatching_RelaxedPrecision
description: On some drivers, the OpSelect SPIR-V instruction with arguments with mismatching
RelaxedPrecision decoration causes a crash

features.name: wrap_switch_in_if_true
description: On some drivers, nested switch statements are mishandled which can be worked around
by wrapping them in if(true)

features.name: disable_depth_stencil_resolve_through_attachment
description: On some drivers, using a depth/stencil resolve attachment results in errors

features.name: limit_max_storage_buffer_size
description: On some drivers, a storage buffer max size limit is exposed that is incompatible with
older hardware

features.name: cl_dump_vk_spirv
description: Enable SPIR-V dumping at runtime for OpenCL programs compiled with clspv

features.name: enable_additional_blend_factors_for_dithering
description: Dithering darkens or brightens pixels depending on coordinates and when repeated
sufficient numbers of times this effect becomes visible to users. Conditionally
enable additional blend factors for dithering

features.name: enable_merge_client_attrib_buffer
description: Enable merge for client attrib buffer if possible

features.name: supports_shader_non_semantic_info
description: Enable non-semantic info inside shader module via VK_KHR_shader_non_semantic_info extension

features.name: supports_8_bit_storage_buffer
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_8bit_storage extension and has the storageBuffer8BitAccess feature

features.name: supports_8_bit_uniform_and_storage_buffer
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_8bit_storage extension and has the uniformAndStorageBuffer8BitAccess feature

features.name: supports_8_bit_push_constant
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_8bit_storage extension and has the storagePushConstant8 feature

features.name: supports_16_bit_storage_buffer
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_16bit_storage extension and has the storageBuffer16BitAccess feature

features.name: supports_16_bit_uniform_and_storage_buffer
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_16bit_storage extension and has the uniformAndStorageBuffer16BitAccess feature

features.name: supports_16_bit_push_constant
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_16bit_storage extension and has the storagePushConstant16 feature

features.name: supports_16_bit_input_output
description: VkDevice supports the VK_KHR_16bit_storage extension and has the storageInputOutput16 feature

features.name: use_vkEvent_for_image_barrier
description: Uses VkEvent instead of VkCmdPipelineBarrier for image barriers

features.name: supports_synchronization2
description: VkDevice supports VK_KHR_synchronization2 extension

features.name: supports_dynamic_rendering
description: VkDevice supports VK_KHR_dynamic_rendering extension

features.name: supports_dynamic_rendering_local_read
description: VkDevice supports VK_KHR_dynamic_rendering_local_read extension

features.name: prefer_dynamic_rendering
description: Whether dynamic rendering should be used instead of render pass objects

features.name: prefer_cached_noncoherent_for_dynamic_stream_buffer_usage
description: Prefer host cached + non-coherent memory for buffers with dynamic/stream usage.
